name: 3d-color-sphere
tagline: 3d Color Sphere with, Color Schemas builtin
body:
Website http://flyingdeath.github.io/3d-Color-Sphere

This project is 3d Color Sphere with, Color Schemas builtin, Implementing HSV
Think of being inside 3d Color Sphere where HSV are mapped to a Polar coordinate system pole theta phi.

Geometric Polygon Type Schemas (Color Theory) :
Use mouse wheel to rotate geometry in the x y plan

Complementary (size slider)
Analogous  (size slider)
Triadic (size slider)
Split-Complementary  (size slider)
Rectangle (width height slider)
Square (width height slider)
Polygonal (click to create polygon size slider )

Value Gradient (value slider)
Random swatch generator (value slider) / Random Value
5 swatch Color Patterns 

Using  HTML, CSS and Javascript, YUI, Three JS, WebGL.

WebGL Needed to work, so if it doesn't work on your system try it on a WebGL Video Card.
Nvidia and ATI Both make Video Card that support WebGL.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebGL
https://www.khronos.org/webgl/wiki/BlacklistsAndWhitelists
